Criteria Notes - Roughness - Where the length of the site or the geometry is such that a road roughness-measuring vehicle cannot be used then the straight edge can be used for checking the surface shape.

○ Where there is Kerb and Channel shall be flush with or no more than 5mm above the LOC.
